about_the_game:
Every Year Banjir is survival game based on a fictionalized Malaysian society depicted as Malaysian animals with the aim to storify and gamify real world issues.
Survive all the harsh conditions in the Tsunami of Timber, the Flooding House, and on the Rooftop of an Apartment building.

This is a world in the near future where serious floods happen more frequently and disastrously till a point where the waters reach to the height of high rise buildings. Although being a fictional world, the game reflects realistic issues faced by Malaysian flood victims.

The demo of the game consist only of the first Shelter stage. This is the stage that you will be able to interact with other NPCs, gain XP, learn survival skills and find survival tools.

In the Shelter Stage, you can equip yourself with the necessary tools to combat the challenges ahead, learn the mechanics of the game and raise your Awareness Level.

short_description: Survive a flood scenario in this animal-fantasy world depicted in an era where floods happen every year! Survive the harsh conditions of the random rainfalls and equip yourself with flood survival knowledge. Learn real world survival skills and make decisions that will save lives.
